General.Name: Space Shuttle Hi-Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Space Shuttle Hi-Tech Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells telecommunication wires and cables in Taiwan. The company operates through four divisions: Wires, Electrical Products, Optical Cables, and Optic Electrical. It offers a range of wires for the computer, communication cable, and various electronic products. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Zhubei, Taiwan.

1.Name: Hui Cheng  Zhu
1.Title: Head of Fin. & Accounting and VP
